plugin.name: ossaudio
plugin.description: OSS (Open Sound System) support for GStreamer

element.name: osssink
element.description: Output to a sound card via OSS
element.author: Erik Walthinsen <omega@cse.ogi.edu>, Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S16LE, U16LE, S8, U8 }, layout=(string)interleaved, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)1; audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S16LE, U16LE, S8, U8 }, layout=(string)interleaved, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)2, channel-mask=(bitmask)0x0000000000000003

element.name: osssrc
element.description: Capture from a sound card via OSS
element.author: Erik Walthinsen <omega@cse.ogi.edu>, Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S16LE, U16LE, S8, U8 }, layout=(string)interleaved, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)1; audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S16LE, U16LE, S8, U8 }, layout=(string)interleaved, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)2, channel-mask=(bitmask)0x0000000000000003
